00092 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00093  * Action Shims
00094  */
00095 
00101 inline std::basic_stringstream<ff_char_t>&
00102 fmt_slices(
00103     std::basic_stringstream<ff_char_t>& sink
00104 ,   int                                 flags
00105 ,   size_t                              /* cchTotal */
00106 ,   size_t                              numResults
00107 ,   ff_string_slice_t const*            results
00108 )
00109 {
00110     { for(size_t i = 0; i < numResults; ++i)
00111     {
00112         ff_string_slice_t const &slice = results[i];
00113 
00114         if(0 != slice.len)
00115         {
00116             sink.write(slice.ptr, static_cast<std::streamsize>(slice.len));
00117         }
00118     }}
00119 
00120     switch((0 != (flags::ff_newLine & flags)) + 2 * (0 != (flags::ff_flush & flags)))
00121     {
00122         default:
00123             FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_UNEXPECTED_CONDITION_APPL_LAYER("impossible flags combination permutation");
00124         case    0:  // Do nothing
00125             break;
00126         case    1:  // New line only
00127             sink.write(FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("\n"), 1);
00128             break;
00129         case    2:  // Flush only
00130             sink.flush();
00131             break;
00132         case    3:  // New line and flush
00133             sink << std::endl;
00134             break;
00135     }
00136 
00137     if(sink.fail())
00138     {
00139 #ifdef STLSOFT_CF_EXCEPTION_SUPPORT
00140         // TODO: Use more-derived exception and capture errno
00141         throw sink_output_exception("Failed to write statement");
00142 #endif /* STLSOFT_CF_EXCEPTION_SUPPORT */
00143     }
00144 
00145     return sink;
00146 }
00147

00154 } /* namespace fastformat */
00155 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
